Texts.Chs: 我不知道怎么联系我的朋友。所有的传送器都重置了，通往德尔塔·弗雷亚II的通道似乎出现了故障，我无法联系上他们。如果你能找到去那里的方法，能麻烦你帮我找一下我的朋友瓦格纳吗？
Texts.Eng: I've no idea how to reach my friend. ^orange;All of the teleporters^reset; leading to Delta Freya II appear to be down, and I can't get word to them. If you find a way there, could you please search for my pal Wagner?

Texts.Chs: 哦，不。 瓦格纳...死了？谢谢你...^orange;坏消息总比没消息好^reset;。请收下这个，谢谢你的努力，远离我吧。现在请你走吧。^green;我需要一个人^reset;静一静。
Texts.Eng: Oh no. Wagner is...dead? Thank you...^orange;sad news is better than no news at all^reset;. Please take this for your efforts, and leave me. Now go, please. ^green;I need to be alone^reset;  for a while.

Texts.Chs: 把^orange;瓦格纳的ID卡^reset;带回orange;科学前哨站^reset;
